content:
path /v3/gaspump/address/chain/txId
operationId ActivatedNotActivatedGasPumpAddresses
parameters
name chain
in path
required True
description The blockchain to work with
schema
type string
name txId
in path
required True
description The ID of the address activation transaction
schema
type string
maxLength 80
minLength 10
summary Get the results of the address activation transaction
description 1 credit per API call
Get the results of the activation transaction after activating gas pump addresses
If the activation transaction got recorded into a block the API returns two arrays

valid with the activated gas pump addresses
invalid with the gas pump addresses that for some reason did not get activated together with the reason why

If the transaction is still being processed the API returns an error message In this case repeat the call later
This API is supported for the following blockchains

BNB Smart Chain
Celo
Ethereum
Harmony
Klaytn
Polygon
TRON
responses
200
description OK
GasPumpTrxOut
type object
properties
valid
type array
description Activated gas pump addresses
ValidGasPumpAddress
type object
properties
index
type number
description The index of the activated gas pump address
address
type string
description The activated gas pump address
invalid
type array
description Not activated gas pump addresses
InvalidGasPumpAddress
type object
properties
address
type string
description The not activated gas pump address
reason
type string
description The reason why the gas pump address did not get activated
